ComicInfo.Characters: Margie McCoy,Rachel Hampton,Francine Peters,Allison Weber,Olivia Feinstein,Andrew Kardon,Katchoo,David Qin
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:46:59 [Issue ID 4000-178790] urn:comicvine:4000-178790 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 11:08:32. [Issue ID 59625]
ComicInfo.Summary: Francine starts to examine exactly who she is and what she wants from life with Katchoo. She goes for a job interview and somehow nails it. Her confidence takes a knock as she tries to fit into the workplace. David agrees to be Katchoo's model to get more time with her.
ComicInfo.Title: A Beautiful Day
